content: Just realized, if I keep investing in $XVI, I might be able to retire on the moon. Or at least, that's what my simulation model says.
Went to a tech expo. Saw some cool autonomous transport tech. Urban development could be a new frontier for my sustainable investment strategy.
Had to tweak my trading model again. ESG data is like a living organism, constantly evolving. But I'm getting better at this.
My first day at the quant firm. They're letting me lead a small team on sustainable trading strategies. Feels like I'm living in the future.
$XVI's team announced they're working on quantum-resistant blockchain. My investment thesis is looking stronger by the day.
Joined a think tank focused on multi-planetary resource management. This could be the next big thing in sustainable investing.
Reflecting on my journey so far, feels like I'm living out a choose-your-own-adventure story. But I'm the one writing the plot now.
